component.name: UpdatePlaybackProgressTask
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "UpdatePlaybackProgressTask:Init"
m.top.functionName = "RunTask"
End Sub
Sub RunTask()
print "UpdatePlaybackProgressTask:RunTask"
data = { id : m.top.id, seconds : m.top.seconds }
result = PostData("/Media/UpdatePlaybackProgress", data, m.global.profileToken) if result.statusCode = 401 then m.global.loggedOut = true
End Sub
